thread.title: BREAKING: Gunman on the loose as woman SHOT DEAD in broad daylight in German street
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Gunman on the loose as woman SHOT DEAD in broad daylight in German street

title: BREAKING: Gunman on the loose as woman SHOT DEAD in broad daylight in German street
text:
BREAKING: Gunman on the loose as woman SHOT DEAD in broad daylight in German street BREAKING: Gunman on the loose as woman SHOT DEAD in broad daylight in German street A WOMAN has been gunned down in broad daylight on a street in Germany, sparking a major manhunt. PUBLISHED: 09:08, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:13, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 
A man wearing blue jeans and a black jacket, fled the murder scene in Offenbach in a small dark-coloured car. 
Police were alerted to the scene just after 8am (local time) on Friday morning. 
The suspected killer is said to be aged between 30 and 40. 
Police deployed a helicopter in the search for him and appealed for the public to be vigilant as the gunman remains at large. 
MORE TO FOLLOW
